title: Update: This Bert Show Member Is At A Crossroads With Their Partner
description:
Our producer Romeo is at a crossroads with his girlfriend. They've had several conversations about her moving to be with him, but there hasn't been a resolution. Is it time to let go and move on so they don't hold each other back?
